name: N Sheik Faridh
summary: 2.5 years of experience in Web Programming, testing, and design of Responsive Web pages. Experienced with React JS, React Flux, Redux architecture. Experienced in developing web pages using HTML/HTML5, CSS/CSS3, JavaScript, React JS, Redux, JQuery, Bootstrap, Node, Express and Mongo DB.

Contributing solutions to the Freshworks customers
Produced clean code for diverse applications
